metadata.feature_description: Displays and manages user tasks, notifications, and workflows with pagination and detail views.

observations: Code suggests Task Management feature exists (TasksController.cs, tasks.js) but NO UI element was found to access it in the PersonaBar.
The '.socialtasks' DOM element exists within the PersonaBar iframe but is hidden (display: none, left: -300px) and empty.
Exhaustive search of PersonaBar menus (Dashboard, Content, Manage, Page Analytics, Settings, Accounts) revealed no Tasks or Notifications menu item.

PersonaBar menu items searched: Site Analytics, Community Analytics, Assets, Pages, Forms, Content Library, Recycle Bin, Users, Roles, Templates, Themes, Styles, Sites, Site Groups, Admin Logs, Copilot Loader, Global Assets, Site Settings, Security, Workflow, SEO, Community, Gamification, Vocabularies, Connectors, Extensions, Services, Servers, Import/Export, Scheduler, Custom CSS, SQL Console, Config Manager, Prompt, About - NONE contained Tasks/Notifications.
JavaScript analysis confirmed: '.socialtasksheader' element (the expected trigger for the Tasks panel) does not exist in the DOM.
The Tasks feature appears to be backend-ready but the UI component to access it is not rendered or enabled in this installation.

Unable to test any of the suggested scenarios (View task list, Navigate task pagination, Expand/collapse task details, Perform task actions, Mark task complete, Filter tasks, Auto-refresh, Notification badges) due to lack of UI access.
Recommendation: Verify that the Task Management module is properly installed and enabled in the PersonaBar configuration.

summary.pass_rate: N/A - Feature not accessible via UI
